page.title: 20THREE CRAFTSMEN
page.content: Unfortunately the planners did not believe them. They have already started by putting in an old range. {There is no electric,}the light comes from a gas lamp. They collect their post once a week because the postman won't drive down the 2 mile long lane. The lane is very narrow. They keep chickens, hens, ducks and goats. The illustrator takes photos of his paintings. These are used to illustrate books. He has completed two so far. The glass blower has built up quite a commercial business. He makes{coloured {iridised glass.}He sends his glass all over the world. He colours his glass with powdered glass which he obtains from Germany. {This entry was compiled by pupils and {staff of CROWAN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
